app_name: News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today
app_detail:
News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today - A news app powered by your Local & World news providers to keep you informed about your news interests!

You can use News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Todayto stay up-to-date on daily breaking news, local news headlines and weather news, world news events, trending videos, funny GIFs and anything you are interested in.

News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Todayprovides over 12,500 trusted local and global news sources to personalize your own news feed around your interests. All in one great home screen app & totally FREE.


News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today:

Stay Informed - Never Miss Breaking News 
ğŸ“° News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today brings you the news on big events like breaking local severe weather or great local events. 
ğŸ“° Stay informed on world news, national news, local news, celebrity news, sports news and weather news. 
ğŸ“° Youâ€™ll always have todayâ€™s breaking news, globally and locally delivered directly to your phone. 

Stay Focused â€“ News content tailored to your personal interests 
ğŸ“° Our artificial intelligence Interests Engine discovers the best news for you daily. 
ğŸ“° Select news about anything from local sports teams to world news topics with News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Todayâ€™s premium featured news content. 

Local Weather & News â€“ Know Ahead of Time 
ğŸ“° Up-to-date local news, weather reports and forecast for every city and town. 
ğŸ“° Find local restaurants, deals, shop openings and more ahead of time from one app. 

Video & Gif â€“ Enjoy Watching More Content 
ğŸ“° When you want to take an entertainment break from the local news, check out the scrollable content feed located right on the Home Screen. Lotâ€™s of Viral videos and Gifâ€™s are waiting for you. Find it with News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today! 
ğŸ“° Checkout hot trending videos and watch a video for all your interests. 

Trusted Sources â€“ Only the Best Content for Our Readers 
ğŸ“° Weâ€™ve streamlined the news reading experience to give you content on the local news topics you care about and put it right on your easy to use Home screen

ğŸ“° You can choose from any of these topics: 

Breaking Local or World Top News Stories 
Breaking Local or World Business News Stories
Breaking Local or World Technology News Stories
Breaking Local or World Science News Stories
Breaking Local or World Sports News Stories
Breaking Local or World Entertainment News Stories
Breaking Local or World Health News Stories



Explore breaking news, viral videos and enjoy a reading experience fully customized to your interests! Subscribe to every niche interest you have and enjoy personalized news from News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today! 

Download today and stay informed on world news and local news! 

FAQ: 
How do I make my reading experience more personalized? 
News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today has a quick setup screen that will allow you to pick your favorite news sources. The feed comes set to standard sources with the ability to add and drop local news and national news sources.
